Title: No Brew Left Behind
Description:
My head is... hurting. There can be only one solution.

We flew over an abandoned brew caravan. You must go find it, and save that brew! That should help bring me back to full strength.

Plus, it would do wonders for the morale of those fighting in the Vale, if we can recover it.
ObjectivesText: Locate the abandoned brew barrels in Kun-Lai Summit.
